name: The Genius Mage Who Uses His Fists
author: Wolcheon
content: MMA world champion Kim Jin-ho has awoken in the wold of Last Saver, as the wizard Zed Arahan.In this other world, knights are close range and wizards are long range. However, it seem like Zed doesn&#039t have any magic power?!A genius who breaks the immutable law has appeared!
